stellarity.messages.cmd.reset_config_to_: All configs were reset to default!
stellarity.messages.cmd.hard_reset_drago: Completely reset the Ender Dragon, witness the horror!
stellarity.messages.cmd.kill_ender_drago: Successfully slain the Ender Dragon, cheating for the win!
stellarity.messages.cmd.generate_end_isl: If they haven't generated automatically, this is a bug and has to be reported!
stellarity.messages.cmd.get_ancient_armo: Gave a full set of Ancient Armor
stellarity.messages.cmd.get_hallowed_arm: Gave a full set of Hallowed Armor
stellarity.messages.cmd.get_shulker_armo: Gave a full set of Shulker Armor
stellarity.messages.cmd.get_random_head: Gave a random 'Treasure Head', out of a total of 60
stellarity.void_fishing.warning: Something tells you you should fish higher...
stellarity.items.armors.ancient_armor.se: Fills you with Wrath of The Ancients,
stellarity.items.armors.hallowed_armor.s: Grants the ability to dodge attacks,
stellarity.items.armors.shulker_armor.se: Shulker Bullets will hunt down your attackers
Allows for up to 10 extra hearts
stellarity.items.materials.for_altar: For use with the Altar of The Accursed
stellarity.items.potions.amarena.descrip: Looks like wine, but it really isn't
stellarity.items.potions.red_potion.flav: 'Just drink it, what could go wrong?'
stellarity.items.spellbooks.conveyance.d: teleports you to the first block it hits
Tilt your head around to guide it
stellarity.items.spellbooks.light.descri: Right Click to summon a friendly aura
which grants healing and damage reduction
stellarity.items.spellbooks.updraft.desc: Right Click to push yourself upwards
with a light gust of wind, giving you
the ability to glide freely for a short time
stellarity.items.spellbooks.natures_wrat: Hold it while exploring to imbue it with a biome's magic,
permanently unlocking or upgrading its abilities
Sneak and use to summon a pack of Spirit Wolves
stellarity.items.trinkets.crest_of_the_e: force to your next melee attack
stellarity.items.trinkets.ender_insignia: Bonus starts weak and slowly increases
Standing up or being hurt resets it
The Dragon's Power is within your hands
stellarity.items.trinkets.starstruck_car: Stars fall when hurt, which ignore
stellarity.items.trinkets.soaring_insign: Sneak and look up/down to adjust height
stellarity.items.weapons.dragonblade.des: A fearsome sword with an otherwordly punch!
stellarity.items.weapons.dragonblade.fla: 'It came from the edge of The End'
stellarity.items.weapons.prismatic_punch: that produce colorful explosions on hit
stellarity.items.weapons.spirit_dagger.d: Holding one attracts Spirits on slashes
Holding one in both left and right hand
allows you to consume said Spirits
and gain a short attack buff
stellarity.items.weapons.tamaris.descrip: instantly killing nearby enemies with low health!
stellarity.items.weapons.frigid_harveste: Imbues itself with souls of slain mobs,
stellarity.items.weapons.stella.descript: The more you attack, the more
stellarity.items.weapons.kaleidoscope.de: Channels power from the core of the sun
Strike enemies to release stored energy
all at once in a powerful discharge
stellarity.items.fisher_of_voids.descrip: Its hook is covered in weird mucus,
stellarity.items.pandoras_barrel.descrip: Summons mobs and drops loot depending on the biome
Much friendlier mobs spawn while in a lit up area
stellarity.items.pandoras_barrel.flavor_: 'Get it? Because it is a barrel and not a box?'
stellarity.items.cursed_tome.discover_hi: The more you explore, the more knowledge this book will be filled with...
stellarity.items.cursed_tome.entries.sha:
A sturdy mangrove Bow.
If Spectral Arrows are used as ammunition, it channels the light from them and diverts it into a powerful quick bolt of energy.

Rare drop from Illusioners in Strongholds.
Drops paired with 7 - 22 Spectral Arrows.
stellarity.items.cursed_tome.entries.clo: Just a Crossbow augmented with some cogs. They allow it to charge and shoot at ridiculous speed, although sacrificing a large portion of damage.
Rare drop from Pillagers in Strongholds.
stellarity.items.cursed_tome.entries.spe: The teleports of Ender Pearl are too chaotic for a human body to handle, causing it to take some damage. This book was made to streamline the chaotic magic into a pure warp, making it much safer to use.
Rare drop from Evokers in Strongholds.
Creates a small aura of divine light, which heals any player inside, cures ailments and grants damage reduction.
Rare drop from Evokers in Strongholds.
Manufactured by the Enchanters from the high mountains with focus on making moving around easier. Pushes its user upwards and grants them ability to glide for a short while.
Rare drop from Evokers in Strongholds.
stellarity.items.cursed_tome.entries.tam:
Even the sword itself is falling under the decaying magic it holds inside.
Makes hit enemies decay away, as well as gives its user the ability to perform a finishing strike whenever said mob is low on health.
66% chance to be dropped by the Ender Dragon.
stellarity.items.cursed_tome.entries.tri:
An Amethyst Shard corrupted by the magic of The End.
Boosts life regeneration while sneaking. Effect starts weak and grow stronger the longer the user is sneaking for.
66% chance to be dropped by the Ender Dragon.
Enhanced with the resources from The End, this Shield absorbs a fraction of blocked damage and redirects it to the attacker on its user's next hit.
66% chance to be dropped by the Ender Dragon.
stellarity.items.cursed_tome.entries.dra:
Nobody knows what it is.

Nobody knows where it came from.

Nobody knows who made it.

Spawns stuck in the Altar after killing the Ender Dragon.

There can be only one.
stellarity.items.cursed_tome.entries.shu:
The mightiest and sturdiest of all the armor sets to have ever been forged.
Makes its wearer almost invulnerable, as well as provides resistance to certain debuffs.
Crafted at the Altar of The Accursed.

The fastest and strongest of all the tools to have ever been created.
Those who hold them experience a sudden energy surge going through their body allowing them to dig and attack faster than usual.
Crafted at the Altar of The Accursed.
stellarity.items.cursed_tome.entries.sar: This tiny dagger steals the light of anything it hits, using it to heal its user or any of their allies.
Crafted at the Altar of The Accursed.
stellarity.items.cursed_tome.entries.sab:
The name is extremely deceving.
Sabrewing can supercharge its shots to increase their power, making it devastating at long range.
Crafted at the Altar of The Accursed.
stellarity.items.cursed_tome.entries.pan:
An attempt at making something from nothing.
Opening it yields various loot and spawns random mobs, depending on biome.

Sometimes found in End Cities.
Also craftable at the Altar of The Accursed.
stellarity.items.cursed_tome.entries.anc: Blesses its user with Wrath of The Ancients, providing a rising damage multiplier which increases with every hit.

Crafted at the Altar of The Accursed with 5/8/7/4 Ancient Plating (for Helmet/Chestplate/Leggins/Boots respectively)

Ancient Plating can be found in Crates, End Cities and can be bought in End Villages.
stellarity.items.cursed_tome.entries.hal: The wearer of this sacred armor is said to be protected by the heaven itself, granting them the ability to completely ignore all damage for a short time.

Crafted at the Altar of The Accursed with 5/8/7/4 Hallowed Ingots (for Helmet/Chestplate/Leggins/Boots respectively)

Hallowed Ingots can be found in Crates, End Cities and can be bought in End Villages.
stellarity.items.cursed_tome.entries.spi: This weapon won't work just by itself. If two are used simultaneously, attacks will sometimes attract lost Spirits. Wielder can consume them to warp to them and get various combat buffs for a short time.
Rare drop from Phantoms in the outer End.
stellarity.items.cursed_tome.entries.fri:
The hard ice captures the spirit of defeated mobs, using them to increase its power.
The more it kills, the more damage it deals, combined with unlocking passive abilities.

Drops from Strays found in Frosted Hills, which have a rare chance being equipped with it.

10% chance to be found inside Frozen Crates.
stellarity.items.cursed_tome.entries.zep: First ever item to be created by the Illagers using the magic of The End. Killing enemies gives a boost to movement speed, which increases in duration with more kills.
Sometimes found in End Cities in Top Towers.
stellarity.items.cursed_tome.entries.spe:
Villagers' attempt at crafting magical items.
This book imbues itself with the energy of biomes its user explores, enhancing its abilities.
Sometimes sold by Librarians in End Villages.
stellarity.items.cursed_tome.entries.tri:
Perhaps the most peculiar fruit The Hallow has ever given birth to. This cursed berry shares its magic with anyone who holds it, greatly empowering their senses and abilities.
Said to taste like bizmuth.

Found in End Ships in The Hallow at a very specific 57.14% chance.

Also found in Hallowed Crates at the exact same oddly specific chance.
Unlike typical carcanets, this one is held for some odd reason. Causes stars to fall nearby when hurt, dealing high damage to anything caught in their trajectory.
33% chance to be dropped by the Empress of Light.

An emblem imbued with the fraction of Empress' power.
Grants its wielder the ability to freely fly, as if gravity wasn't a thing.

Rare drop from the Empress of Light.

Guaranteed to drop if killed in the Overworld during the day.
stellarity.items.cursed_tome.entries.ste: Made out of the purest of Hallow's crystals, filled with blazing energy. The more accurate hits are landend on one's enemy, the hotter the flames become.
33% chance to be dropped by the Empress of Light.
stellarity.items.cursed_tome.entries.pri: Ender Pearls exposed to the magic of The Hallow slowly lose their darkness. They have the ability to return to its thrower after a short period of time.
33% chance to be dropped by the Empress of Light.
An arbalest manufactured from crystallized Wood from Hallow's trees. Transforms all arrows into rainbow blasts which seek out and explode on impact.
33% chance to be dropped by the Empress of Light.
stellarity.items.cursed_tome.entries.kal: A greatsword of incredible power, which comes directly from the sun. Charges itself and releases the stored energy in a powerful discharge once swung.
Dropped by the Empress of Light, but only if killed in the Overworld in daytime.
stellarity.advancements.blindfolded.desc: Enrage an Enderman by looking at it
stellarity.advancements.beam_me_up.descr: Teleport over 100 meters from a single throw of an Ender Pearl
stellarity.advancements.bullseye_2.descr: Hit a bullseye of a Target Block with an Ender Pearl from at least 10 blocks
stellarity.advancements.champions_ballad: Can't fight a Boss without some good tunes!
stellarity.advancements.night_sky_stalke: Kill a Phantom. They will vanish as soon as you get some sleep
stellarity.advancements.postmortal_2.des: Save yourself from death in The Void with a Totem of Undying
stellarity.advancements.pandoras_barrel_: Open a Pandora's Barrel inside Deep Dark. Odds are that you will survive...
Place down and open a Pandora's Barrel. You never know what you're gonna get!
stellarity.advancements.aota_intro.descr: Toss any Enchanted Book over the Altar of The Accursed to imbue it with the darkest of magic
stellarity.advancements.i_am_titanium.de: Craft a full set of Shulker Armor
Use the Altar of The Accursed to craft some of the most powerful of gear
stellarity.advancements.kaliyah.descript: Deal maximum damage possible with a single Dragonblade's punch
stellarity.advancements.dragonborn.descr: Obtain the Dragonblade, a legendary sword of a truly unknown origin...
stellarity.advancements.disassembly.desc: Use Tamaris to execute a mob with low health
stellarity.advancements.god_slayer.descr: You have proven yourself worthy by defeating the vicious Beast twice
stellarity.advancements.kill_la_kill.des: Trigger the Execute ability on a Warden.
stellarity.advancements.sacrificial_ritu: Place down 4 End Crystals on top of the 4 elevated Bedrock Blocks to awake the vicious beast...
stellarity.advancements.third_times_the_: Summon the Ender Dragon a third time
stellarity.advancements.hallelujah.descr: Dodge an attack with a full set of Hallowed Armor
stellarity.advancements.colorful_arsenal: Color a Shulker Box any color you want
stellarity.advancements.kill_shulker.des: Kill a Shulker for its Shells
stellarity.advancements.jeb_.description: Craft all color variants of Shulker Boxes
stellarity.advancements.rename_shulker_b: Rename a Shulker Box with an Anvil
stellarity.advancements.super_sonic.desc: Use Elytra to fly through a 1 by 1 gap while moving faster than 40 m/s
stellarity.advancements.treasure_room.de: Obtain a rare Treasure Head from a Chest in an End City. Can you find all 55?
stellarity.advancements.open_chest_in_en: Open a Treasure Chest in an End City. Congrats! You are propably a millionaire now
stellarity.advancements.forever_stranded: Find a Village in the middle of nowhere. How did they even get there?
stellarity.advancements.keep_warm.descri: Wear a full set of Leather Armor in any of the coldest biomes of The End
stellarity.advancements.spirit_assasin.d: Teleport over 60 blocks with a pair of Spirit Daggers
stellarity.advancements.topped_off.descr: Attain maximum health by consuming 10 Crystal Heartfish
stellarity.advancements.duskberry_find.d: Pick up a Duskberry from a Chest in Hallow's End Ship
stellarity.advancements.poor_life_choice: Eat, plant and feed a Fox a Duskberry
stellarity.advancements.absolute_devotio: Upgrade your Netherite Hoe to its Shulker version. You have officialy became the master of Husbandry!
stellarity.advancements.confusing_fruit_: Find and eat a Golden Chorus Fruit
stellarity.advancements.find_gloop.descr: Free a Gloop from a Pandora's Barrel opened in any Swamp biome.
stellarity.advancements.plant_chorus_fru: Plant a Chorus Flower in every of the 3 dimensions
stellarity.advancements.plant_chors_frui: Plant a Chorus Flower in the Overworld
stellarity.advancements.supreme_server_o: Fish out an 'ultra super rare (not really)' collectible from The Void
stellarity.advancements.the_void_provide: Fish out and open a Crate from the unknown
stellarity.advancements.void_reels.descr: Cast your Fishing Rod into the open darkness of The End
stellarity.advancements.find_warped_fore: Enter the Warped Forest - the home of Endermen of The Nether
stellarity.advancements.a_step_to_the_en: Blaze Powder is usually used for brewing, but perhaps something could be fused with it...?
stellarity.advancements.imbuements.descr: ...and use it to brew Lingering Potions!
stellarity.advancements.the_beggining.de: Kill the Wither in The End
stellarity.advancements.rare_find.descri: Obtain an uncommon drop from the Illagers residing in Strongholds
stellarity.advancements.journeys_end.des: Use 12 Eyes of Ender to activate an End Portal
stellarity.advancements.obtain_ender_pea: Get your hands on an Ender Pearl - a vital element of your journey
Once you combine Blaze Powder and an Ender Pearl they turn into... something special?
stellarity.advancements.kill_dragon.desc: The Beast is dead, and The End is waiting for you to discover its secrets...
stellarity.advancements.max_out_aery_swo: Reach +9 Extra Damage on Frigid Harvester
ᴛɪᴘ: ᴛʜɪѕ ᴍɪɢʜᴛ ʀᴇǫᴜɪʀᴇ ѕᴏᴍᴇ ɢʀɪɴᴅɪɴɢ...
stellarity.advancements.transmute_item.d: Transmute an item into a different item in the waters of The Hallow
stellarity.advancements.kill_large_phant: Kill a Phantom that is bigger than normal
stellarity.advancements.headhunter.tip: ᴛɪᴘ: ʏᴏᴜ ᴄᴀɴ ʀᴇ-ʀᴏʟʟ ᴅᴜᴘʟɪᴄᴀᴛᴇs ᴀᴛ ᴛʜᴇ ᴀʟᴛᴀʀ ᴏғ ᴛʜᴇ ʟɪɢʜᴛ
stellarity.advancements.summon_empress.d: Throw Pixie Dust onto Altar of The Light to summon Her Majesty
stellarity.advancements.fae_flayer.descr: Move an Altar of The Light to the Overworld, then summon and kill the Empress during the day. Your reward shall be great
stellarity.advancements.charge_anchor_en: A Ship in The Sea of Eternity
Use a Respawn Anchor to change your respawn location in The End
stellarity.death_messages.example_cause: %s died randomly due to an example of Stellarity's custom damage system
stellarity.death_messages.sharanga_explo: %1$s was torn apart by %2$s's Spectral Boom Boom
stellarity.death_messages.carcanet: %1$s was struck too hard by %2$s's star
stellarity.death_messages.spirit_dagger: %1$s had their spirit slashed in half by %2$s
stellarity.death_messages.dragonblade: %1$s was punched into the otherworld by %2$s
stellarity.death_messages.dot.prismatic_: %1$s was burnt alive by rainbow lights
stellarity.death_messages.natures_wrath: %1$s experienced what nature's revenge looks like
stellarity.death_messages.eol.prismatic_: %1$s forgot to dodge the Empress of Light's attacks
stellarity.death_messages.eol.ethereal_l: %1$s was pierced through with the Empress of Light's Ethereal Lance
stellarity.death_messages.eol.dash: %1$s didn't move out of the Empress of Light's way in time
